name: Decoration
description: This module adds new decorative building blocks and improves vanilla ones.

features.name: Decorative Corals
features.description: Log-type blocks with the log 'bark' texture on all sides. Crafted with a 2x2 of the respective log. Can be turned into walls.

features.name: Carved Wood
features.description: Carved Wood is a cornerstone type block for wood, made with a 2x2 of the respective wood slab.

features.name: Soul Sandstone
features.description: Sandstone made of Soul Sand. All recipes are as expected. Soul Sandstone can be turned into Stairs, Slabs, and Walls.

features.name: Vanilla Stairs and Slabs
features.description: Stairs and Slabs for a bunch of vanilla materials: Stone, Granite, Diorite, Andesite, End Bricks, Prismarine, Prismarine Bricks, Dark Prismarine, and Red Nether Bricks.

features.name: Vanilla Walls
features.description: Walls for a bunch of vanilla materials: Stone, Stone Bricks, Granite, Diorite, Andesite, Sandstone, Red Sandstone, End Bricks, Purpur, Prismarine, Prismarine Bricks, Dark Prismarine, Bricks, and Quartz.

features.name: More Stone Bricks
features.description: Stone Bricks for Granite, Diorite and Andesite. Crafted with a 2x2 of the Polished variant. All of them can be used for stairs, slabs, and walls.

features.name: Log Blocks
features.description: Adds blocks like Stripped Logs, Stripped Logs Stairs, Stripped Log Slabs and more

features.name: Wood Blocks
features.description: Adds the 1.13 bark and also stripped version, slabs and stairs
